  • One is that the word derived from French lâ€™Å“uf. (False Theory)
  • Another, and far more accepted, is that this sense of love comes from the expression â€œto play for love.â€ A similar idea is found in the origin of the word amateur, which can refer to a person who does something strictly for love; the word comes from the Latin word amare, meaning â€œto love.â€
